name: Southern Belle
overview: The ultimate aim is to travel from London to Brighton taking your place on the footplate of this King Arthur class 4-6-0 locomotive. A menu has seven options, including a demonstration run, various practise options and a problem run. A demonstration run automatically engages after a minute. This gives you an idea of the features and terrain that you are going to meet. When you have mastered the training, you can move on to more challenging schedules such as the record breaking run, set on July 26, 1903 at 48 minutes 41 seconds.
